issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: storm-core
components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

fields.description:

fields.summary: Nimbus sometimes throws NPE when clicking show topology visualization button

comments.body:
Below patch might help, so need to try reproducing this after the patch is merged.

https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/2305
This is still happening after STORM-2533.

[~kabhwan]  I am interested in looking into this issue. Could you please let me how to reproduce this? I launched a non-secure cluster and submitted a wordcount topology. I didn't see the errors you described above
[~kabhwan]  Any updates on how to reproduce this?
That was intermittent. Let's reopen if we see it again.
